tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of submitting and creating workshops and labs for Oracle LiveLabs and other platforms.

tutorials.title: Need more information on GitHub?
tutorials.description: Describes what GitHub is and general information on projects and repositories

tutorials.title: Need to understand the status workflow in WMS?
tutorials.description: Details the status in WMS and what comes next, who is responsible.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Submit new workshop in WMS
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through working with Oracle Workshop Management System (WMS) and shows you the workflow for developing a workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set up GitHub and install tools
tutorials.description: This lab helps you configure your environment for developing labs and workshops using Markdown and GitHub.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Stay in sync with GitHub environment
tutorials.description: This lab shows you the Oracle LiveLabs GitHub folder structure how to fork and clone the repositories. Also use the common labs and images with the workshop templates.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Develop Markdown and content
tutorials.description: This labs give you tips and tricks for editing and how to develop your lab (markdown) content using LiveLabs standards and accessibility for your workshops.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: QA checks and steps
tutorials.description: This lab prepares you for QA of your workshop, details to look for and adjust before publishing your workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Publish your workshop
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the WMS steps to publish your workshop.

tutorials.title: Additional optional labs: Develop LiveLabs Sprints
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create a Sprint for LiveLabs

tutorials.title: Additional optional labs: Setup graphical remote desktop
tutorials.description: This lab will describe how to create and use a graphical remote desktop for your workshop.

tutorials.title: Additional optional labs: Create custom image for marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will describe how to create and use a marketplace image for your workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
